org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.policy

Class SoftmaxActionSelection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.policy.GreedyPolicy
      • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.policy.SoftmaxActionSelection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Policy

    public class SoftmaxActionSelection
extends GreedyPolicy
    Implementation of the Softmax policy (aka Boltzman Exploration)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getNormalizedSoftmaxAction

        public static Action getNormalizedSoftmaxAction(QFunction Q,
                                                ActionSet actionSet,
                                                double temperature,
                                                State state,
                                                double minNormValue,
                                                double maxNormValue)
        returns an action which is selected wrt. softmax action selection. all values are normalized in (minNormValue, maxNormValue).
        Parameters:
        Q - the Q-function
        actionSet - the action set
        temperature - the temperature
        state - the state
        minNormValue - the minimum normalized value
        maxNormValue - the maximum normalized value
        Returns:
        The Action

      • getNormalizedSoftmaxProbabilitiesByQFunction

        public static double[] getNormalizedSoftmaxProbabilitiesByQFunction(QFunction Q,
                                                                    ActionSet actionSet,
                                                                    double temperature,
                                                                    State state,
                                                                    double minNormValue,
                                                                    double maxNormValue)
        returns softmax probabilities of all actions in state s (wrt. the given Q-function and temperature). Values are normalized in (minNormValue,maxNormValue)
        Parameters:
        Q - the Q-function
        actionSet - the action set
        temperature - the temperature
        state - the state
        minNormValue - the minimum normalized value
        maxNormValue - the maximum normalized value
        Returns:
        The normalized Softmax probabilities
